arm_group.description: Based on personal fitness an individualized physical activity program will be built and followed by each individual in the arm
The entire group of individuals in this arm will follow a physical activity program according to the General Physical Activity Guidelines

brief_summary.textblock:
Individuals of advanced age undergo both physical and cognitive deterioration. The aim of
      this study is to explore the connection between level of physical activity and health
      parameters, quality of life, and frailty.

clinical_study.brief_title: Physical Activity for Improving Quality of Life and Reducing Frailty in Advanced Age

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          -  Age above 65

          -  Able to undergo graded stress exam

        Exclusion Criteria:

          -  All others

intervention.description: Physical activity either by individualized program or general guidelines

facility.name: Zinman College for Physical Education and Sport Sciences

clinical_study.official_title: Physical Activity for Improving Quality of Life and Reducing Frailty in Advanced Age: Individually Tailored Program vs the General Guidelines Recommended by Offical Health Organizations.

primary_outcome.description: Aerobic fitness will be measured with a graded stress exam

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.study_design: Allocation: Randomized, Endpoint Classification: Efficacy Study, Intervention Model: Parallel Assignment, Masking: Single Blind (Subject), Primary Purpose: Prevention
